content:
In this dataset, people are asked whether they believe a tweet contains hatespeech or not. 0 means no hatespeech, and 1 means that there is hatespeech.

Examples from the dataset (there may not be any):Examples from the dataset (there may not be any)
Example 1:
Text: ’Toxic masculinity’ is a made up term used to denigrate men. Some men are toxic; masculinity is natural & healthy. Women murder millions of babies every year. Where are the ‘toxic femininity’ or ‘toxic hypergamy’ labels? I refuse to be drawn into a war of words. I speak truth.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 2:
Text: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUzZd2H7QXQ  The Root 'The 8 Kinds of Black Donald Trump Supporters' #TheRootArticles
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 3:
Text: Its one party system. The right is bragging about unemployment numbers when we know Ovomit bastardized the formula to figure unemployment numbers more than once. He was criticized for it but we still use the same formula then tout how good things are. WTF!!!!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 4:
Text: Let’s talk about anything and everything except the elephant in the room - #Canada’s overwhelming #Immigration fiasco http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/bel...

Text: Worked at this school for one year. I have nothing nice to say about these colleagues, except he smiled and laughed like the fat Nigerian he is.https://thefederalist.com/2018/08/07/emails-reveal...

Example 6:
Text: This is so much b*******. She's corrupt and deeply unpopular, so she's pulling a Hillary Clinton!

Text: We shouldn't have to arm ourselves and have guard with ARs stationed at every public place in order to defend ourselves from violent retards. The liberalization of mental health care in the 70s is directly responsible for mass shooting incidents we see today.

Text: They say it's bad to speak ill of the dead. So as far as McCain goes, I'll say the truth: warmonger. He'd wake up every night, shouting BOMB THEM! Never met a country that wouldn't look better with bombs falling on it. Lockheed paid tribute to him!

Target Example:
Text: Well... at least a “man” was still first. By the time all of this makes it to Globalist textbooks in the future it will be a female astronaut who went to the moon just to abort her baby there because she wanted to do it first... before using her size A bra to sling the spacecraft back.
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer and nothing else.
